data.actual_result: Lower 1/3rd or so of screen will not have messages, new sent messages will further exaggerate space at bottom of screen
data.expected_result: Screen will fill to show maximum amount of messages possible, and new messages sent will appear at bottom of screen
data.short_description: Client doesn't grab enough messages to fill vertical screen space
data.steps_to_repro: - Have large 16:9 or 16:10 vertical monitor - Go into DM or channel with more than 50 messages - Observe that lower 1/3rd of screen does not fill with messages
